item.title: A p-value picture
item.description: Much ado and to say about the p-value. Let me add one more point; actually not really from myself, but from Diez, Barr, and Cetinkaya-Rundel (2012), p. 189; good book in one is looking for “orthodox” statistics. library(tidyverse) ggplot(NULL, aes(c(-5,5))) + geom_area(stat = "function", fun = dnorm, fill = "grey40", xlim = c(-5, 2)) + geom_area(stat = "function", fun = dnorm, fill = "#00998a", xlim = c(2, 5)) + labs(y = "", x = "X") + theme(axis.
